name: SITAONAIR
goal: SITAONAIR provides the complete range of products and services an airline needs to realise the full potential of connected aircraft regardless of fleet size, route structure or aircraft type. We provide in ground and inflight connectivity, cockpit data services, air traffic management solutions, aircraft communications and infrastructure.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Transport
euInitiatives:
Telecommunications & Aviation and in particular, Mobile and internet communication system on board an aircraft.
ACARS services (cockpit data link)
